page.title: 07COSFORD SPORTING FACILITIES
page.content: R.A.F.Cosford has a fine selection of sporting facilities including the National Indoor Athletics Track which hosts most of the G.B.international fixtures.It also possesses a near Olympic size swimming pool which is used for inter-squadron swimming and polo matches.The pool was built in 1938 and is used for sub-aqua training canoeing,water polo as well providing a facility used by local schools and clubs.There is also an indoor rock climbing face,a roller skating rink and 2 gymnasia used for basketball,net ball,badminton,volleyball and a number of other games.The camp has 4 squash courts and a number of shooting ranges as well as a number of football,rugby, hockey and cricket pitches.Other outdooractivities catered for include camping,sailing,gliding while indoors judo and fencing are played.
